get.summary: GetAdminAudit returns audit events (admin only).
ListGovernanceCosts lists cost snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceCosts ingests cost snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceResources lists tracked resources (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceResources ingests resource inventory (admin only).

get.summary: GetGovernanceSummary returns governance summary metrics (admin only).

post.summary: SyncGovernanceSources refreshes inventory from known sources (admin only).

get.summary: ListGovernanceUsage lists usage snapshots (admin only).

post.summary: IngestGovernanceUsage ingests usage snapshots (admin only).

get.summary: GetAdminImpersonateStatus returns current impersonation status (admin only).

post.summary: SyncProjects syncs all projects from external systems (admin only).

get.summary: GetAwsSSOConfig returns the configured AWS SSO start URL and region.

post.summary: LogoutAwsSSO clears any stored AWS SSO tokens.
PollAwsSSO polls for device authorization completion.
StartAwsSSO begins the AWS device authorization flow.

get.summary: GetAwsSSOStatus returns connection status for the authenticated user.
AzurePortalRedirect opens the Azure portal with a login hint.

post.summary: ValidateAwsSSO checks that AWS SSO credentials can mint role credentials.

ListAzureSubscriptions returns available subscriptions for the provided service
principal.
ValidateAzureSP verifies Azure service principal credentials.
ListGCPProjects returns accessible projects for the provided service account.
ValidateGCPServiceAccount verifies GCP service account JSON by minting a token.

get.summary: ListEveServers returns configured EVE-NG servers.
GetEveStats returns basic EVE-NG server stats for the status dashboard.
GCPConsoleRedirect opens the GCP console with a login hint.
GiteaPublicSSO logs into Gitea with a read-only public account.
GiteaSSO performs a one-time token exchange for Gitea and redirects to the UI.
GetAPIHealth returns a summary of database and redis health.
GetEveHealth checks configured EVE-NG endpoints.
GetLDAPHealth checks LDAP connectivity.
ExportProjects returns project and user state for internal tooling.
GetLabsRunning returns running labs across providers (public).
GetLabsForUser returns labs scoped to the authenticated user.

NautobotSSO performs a one-time token exchange for Nautobot and redirects to the
UI.
NetboxSSO performs a one-time token exchange for NetBox and redirects to the UI.
ListNetlabLabs returns Netlab labs metadata.
GetNetlabLab returns metadata for a specific Netlab lab.
GetNetlabRuns returns recent Netlab runs for a project.
ListNetlabServers returns configured Netlab runners.
GetProjects returns workspaces visible to the authenticated user.

post.summary: CreateProject provisions a new Skyforge project.

delete.summary: DeleteProject deletes a project and its backing resources.

get.summary: ListProjectArtifacts lists artifact objects for a project.
DownloadProjectArtifact returns a presigned download redirect for the artifact.

post.summary: UploadProjectArtifact uploads or presigns an artifact to the project's bucket.

get.summary: GetProjectAWSStatic returns AWS static credential status.
GetProjectAzureCredentials returns Azure service principal status.

put.summary: PutProjectAzureCredentials stores Azure service principal credentials.

get.summary: GetProjectGCPCredentials returns GCP service account status.

put.summary: PutProjectGCPCredentials stores GCP service account JSON.

get.summary: ListProjectDeployments lists deployment definitions for a project.

post.summary: CreateProjectDeployment creates a deployment definition for a project.

delete.summary: DeleteProjectDeployment removes a deployment definition from Skyforge.

put.summary: UpdateProjectDeployment updates an existing deployment definition.

post.summary: DestroyProjectDeployment triggers a destructive run (destroy) for a deployment.
StartProjectDeployment starts a deployment run in Skyforge.
StopProjectDeployment attempts to stop the most recent task for this deployment.

get.summary: GetProjectEve returns the project's EVE server selection.

put.summary: UpdateProjectEve updates the project's EVE server selection.

get.summary: GetProjectEveLab returns EVE lab state for the project.

post.summary: CreateProjectEveLab creates an EVE lab for the project.

get.summary: GetProjectNetlab returns the project's netlab server selection.

put.summary: UpdateProjectNetlab updates the project's netlab server selection.

get.summary: GetProjectNetlabTemplates lists Netlab templates for a project.

post.summary: RunProjectAnsible triggers an ansible run for a project.
RunProjectNetlab triggers a netlab run for a project.
RunProjectTofuApply triggers a tofu apply run for a project.
RunProjectTofuPlan triggers a tofu plan run for a project.
SyncProject syncs resources for a single project.

get.summary: ListProjectVariableGroups lists Skyforge environments for a project.

post.summary: CreateProjectVariableGroup creates a Skyforge environment for a project.

delete.summary: DeleteProjectVariableGroup deletes a Skyforge environment for a project.

put.summary: UpdateProjectVariableGroup updates a Skyforge environment for a project.

post.summary: SyncProjectBlueprint syncs a project's blueprint catalog into the repo.

get.summary: PublicConfig exposes non-sensitive public UI configuration.
GetRuns returns recent runs from Skyforge.

post.summary: CreateRun launches a task in Skyforge (admin only).

get.summary: GetRunOutput returns output for a specific Skyforge task.
SessionTraefik is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint.

head.summary: SessionTraefikHead is a Skyforge SSO gate compatible endpoint (HEAD).

get.summary: GetTemplates returns available templates for a project.
GetToolServicesStatus returns start/stop state for personal toolchain services.

post.summary: SetToolServiceReplicas sets the replica count for a personal toolchain service.

get.summary: GetUIConfig returns UI configuration values.
PlatformHealth serves the platform health payload.
CheckAll performs a comprehensive health check of all system components.
Check is a simple health check helper that verifies the application is running.
LabsRedirect resolves the configured labs UI redirect.
LabsRedirectAny handles subpaths under /labs.

post.summary: CreateNotification creates a new notification.

get.summary: GetUserNotifications retrieves notifications for a specific user.

put.summary: MarkAllNotificationsAsRead marks all notifications for a user as read.
MarkNotificationAsRead marks a notification as read.

get.description: This is designed for an unauthenticated landing page and must not leak user/project identifiers.
get.summary: StatusSummary returns a public, safe platform status summary.

post.summary: Delete removes an object from the bucket.

get.summary: List returns all objects in the bucket.

post.summary: List returns all objects in the bucket.
Read retrieves data from the bucket.
Write stores data in the bucket.

delete.summary: DeleteFile deletes a file from storage.

get.summary: ReadFile downloads a file from storage.

post.summary: WriteFile uploads a file to storage.

get.summary: SwaggerOpenAPI serves the OpenAPI schema.
GetNotificationSettings retrieves notification settings (admin only).

GetPublicNotificationSettings retrieves notification settings for authenticated
users.

get.description: Skyforge uses username-based identities, so \`id\` is the username.
get.summary: ListAssignableUsers lists users that can be shared on projects.
SearchUsers searches LDAP for users matching q.
Version reports the running server version info.
